name: Toilet Pack
noteforcolor: You can change the color of the pack to a hex color of your choice, e.g. #8e24aa
please read this: To add a level to this pack, change the 'id' of the pack to your name, and add your name to the 'inwhatpack' array in a level's JSON file you want to add to the pack in the data folder, e.g. 'inwhatpack': ['test']
